Uses of XYPlot in org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.plot
 

Classes in org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.plot that implement XYPlot
 class DefaultXYPlot
          A DefaultXYPlot is responsible for drawing the main chart area (excluding axes), mapping one or more datasets from (domain,range) space to (x,y) screen space by delegating to one or more ValueAxis implementations.
